properties.Name_of_th: Canal from Bambaragahadeniya Pihilla to Uda Aswedduma
properties.Observatio: The total length of the canal is about 1.0km and 140m long section of canal is concreted. Command area 20.0 acres
properties.Descriptio:
Canal reservation protection by concrete lining  For  100 mm thick , 300 mm  wide  and 300 mm high canal -double banking

Stream / canal  reservation protection by earthfilling of  strip   of 1.5m to 2.0 m wide  and average Depth of 0.5m

Vegetative cove

properties.Name_of_th: Canal of upper side of Anguruwela lake
properties.Observatio: The anicut is built of Soil and bollders
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of 1.2 m high Weir across stream excluding abutments and stop planks

Miscellaneous

Contingancies 10%
